General.Name: Guru Organic Energy Corp
General.Description: GURU Organic Energy Corp., a beverage company, provides natural, organic, and plant-based energy drinks in Canada and the United States. The company offers its products under the Guru Original, Guru Lite, Guru Energy Water, Guru Matcha, Yerba Mate, and Guayusa Tropical Punch names. It markets its organic energy drinks through a distribution network of approximately 25,000 points of sale, as well as through guruenergy.com and Amazon. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Montréal, Canada.
General.Address: 7236 Waverly Street, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2R 0C2
